Title: Hard Facts: Vandalism and Vulgarity
Writer: Tony Yacenda, Dan Perrault, Tony Yacenda (created by), Dan Perrault (created by)
Actors: Tyler Alvarez, Griffin Gluck, Jimmy Tatro, Camille Hyde
Plot: When senior class clown Dylan Maxwell is expelled for vandalism, sophomore Peter Maldonado begins an investigation that questions Dylan's guilt.
